SELECT Count(*) FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ou.outitem_no) AS rn, ou.*, c.cust_nm, ord.order_dt, ord.order_end_dt, ord.order_status_chk, i.item_nm, oi.qty, u.user_nm
FROM TB_OUTITEM ou
INNER JOIN TB_CUSTMST c ON ou.cust_cd = c.cust_cd INNER JOIN TB_ORDER ord ON ou.order_no = ord.order_no INNER JOIN TB_OUTITEM_ITEM oi ON ou.outitem_no = oi.outitem_no AND ou.order_no = oi.order_no INNER JOIN TB_ITEMMST i ON oi.item_cd = i.item_cd INNER JOIN TB_USERMST u ON ou.OUTITEM_EMP_ID = u.user_id WHERE ou.outitem_delete_chk = 0 ) AS sub

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ou.outitem_no) AS rn, ou.*, c.cust_nm, ord.order_dt, ord.order_end_dt, ord.order_status_chk, i.item_nm, oi.qty, u.user_nm
FROM TB_OUTITEM ou INNER JOIN TB_CUSTMST c ON ou.cust_cd = c.cust_cd INNER JOIN TB_ORDER ord ON ou.order_no = ord.order_no INNER JOIN TB_OUTITEM_ITEM oi ON ou.outitem_no = oi.outitem_no AND ou.order_no = oi.order_no INNER JOIN TB_ITEMMST i ON oi.item_cd = i.item_cd INNER JOIN TB_USERMST u ON ou.OUTITEM_EMP_ID = u.user_id WHERE ou.outitem_delete_chk = 0 ) AS sub WHERE rn >= #{start} AND rn <= #{end}

SELECT ord.order_no, custmst.cust_nm AS customer_name, STUFF(( SELECT ', ' + itemmst.item_nm + ' (' + CAST(order_item.qty AS VARCHAR(10)) + '개)' FROM tb_order_item AS order_item JOIN tb_itemmst AS itemmst ON order_item.item_cd = itemmst.item_cd WHERE ord.order_no = order_item.order_no FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS items FROM tb_order AS ord JOIN tb_custmst AS custmst ON ord.cust_cd = custmst.cust_cd WHERE ord.order_status_chk IN (0, 2) -- 주문 상태가 0 또는 2인 경우에만 선택 GROUP BY ord.order_no, custmst.cust_nm
